Texts.Chs: 克鲁西斯原本想杀死他们，但由于于心不忍就把他们放逐到无尽黑暗之中，希望他们来日能改邪归正。但是，他们始终背弃了克鲁西斯，再也没有回到克鲁西斯的怀抱之中。正因为如此，当发现那群太空海盗的时候，所有翼族皆有义务汇报至上级。
Texts.Eng: Kluex laments the loss of his children, and their spiral into darkness. But they will not embrace him, will not return to the fold. And thus, it is any good Avian's duty to report a space pirate penguin sighting to the nearest authorities.

Texts.Chs: 有一种存在于这宇宙遥远角落的小型类翼族生物，他们有喙，无法飞行，他们成为太空海盗为非作歹，导致他们恶名远扬。据传说而言，他们是克鲁西斯的后代，不过由于他们过于邪恶而被遗弃了。
Texts.Eng: There is a species, in the far corners of the universe, which many are aware of. Small Avian-like creatures, waddling beasts with beaks and flightless wings. They operate as space pirates, rogues and renegades. Legend tells that they are the children of Kluex himself, cast out due to their wicked ways; the first Flightless.
